committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fossil and Synthetic Fuels

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the abrupt decontrol of all natural gas prices.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the schedule for domestic natural gas price deregulation should not be accelerated.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with respect to the abrupt decontrol of all natural gas prices.
